chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Woman of Tanchico
chapters.info: Saal, p. 352 (282)—Serving woman in The Woman of Tanchico, an inn in Tar Valon at which Thom Merrilin tells stories and at which Mat Cauthon stops on his way out of town. Thom describes her (while drunk, at least) as being very pretty. Mat thinks she an Mada may be sisters; Saal is the younger of the two.
